Translations.Text: ane jyare marayamana dikaranum udaharana apavamam avyum to, tenathi tamari koma (khusithi) ciso padava lagi
ane te loko'e kahyum ke amara pujyo saram che athava te? Te lokonum avum kahevum phakta jhaghadana hetuthi hatum. Parantu a loko jhaghado karanara ja che
isa a.Sa. Pana phakta banda che, jena para ame upakara karyo ane temane isra'ilana santana mate kudaratani nisani banavi
ane jo ame icchata to tamara badalamam pharista'one lavata, je'o dharati para nayaba banata
ane ni:Sanka isa a.Sa. Kayamatani nisani che, basa! Tame (kayamata) ange sanka na karo ane marum anusarana karo, a ja satya marga che
ane setana tamane roki na le, kharekhara te tamaro khullo dusmana che

ane jyare isa a.Sa. Camatkara la'ine avya, to kahyum ke, hum tamari pase hikamata la'ine avyo chum ane etala mate avyo chum ke tame thodika babatomam vivada karo cho, tene spasta kari da'um, basa! Tame allaha ta'alathi daro ane marum kahyum mano
maro ane tamaro palanahara phakta allaha ta'ala che, basa! Tame sau teni bandagi karo, satya marga a (ja) che
pachi (isra'ilana santanana) jutho'e andaro'andara vivada karyo, basa! Atyacari loko mate kharabi che, du:Khadayi yatanana divasani
a loko phakta kayamatani raha ju'e che, ke te acanaka temana para avi jase ane temane jana pana nahim thaya
te divase (khasa) mitro pana ekabijana dusmana bani jase, daravavala loko sivaya
mara banda'o! Ajana divase tamara mate na ko'i du:Kha che ane na to tame nirasa thaso
Je amari ayato para imana lavya ane te'o musalamana hata
tame ane tamari patni'o raji-khusithi jannatamam praveso
temani careya bajuthi sonani rakabi ane sonana pyala lavavamam avase, te loko jeni iccha kare ane jenathi te'oni ankhone santi male, badhum ja tyam hase ane tame temam hammesa raheso
a ja te jannata che, ke tame potana karmona badalamam tena varasadara banavavamam avya cho
tyam tamara mate khuba ja phalo hase, jene tame khata raheso
ni:Sanka aparadhi loko jahannamani yatanamam hammesa rahese
a yatana kyareya temana parathi halavi karavamam nahim ave ane te temam ja nirasa padya rahese
ane ame temana para atyacara nathi karyo, parantu te pote ja atyacari hata
ane pokari-pokarine kahese ke he dvarapala! Taro palanahara amane mrtyu api de, te kahese ke tamane (hammesa) rahevanum che
ame to tamari pase satya la'ine avya, parantu tamara manthi vadhare padata loko satyathi cidata hata
sum te loko'e ko'i karyano pakko irado kari lidho che, ni:Sanka ame pana thosa kama karavavala che
sum te loko anumana kare che ke ame temani chupi ane khanagi vato nathi janata? (Ni:Sanka ame badhum sambhali rahya chi'e). Uparanta amara nakki karela (pharista'o) temani pase ja lakhi rahya che
tame kahi do! Ke jo kadaca rahamanane santana hoya, to hum sau prathama bandagi karavavalo hota
akaso, dharati ane arsano palanahara, te sauthi pavitra che, jenum a loko varnana kare che
have tame te lokone aja takarara ane vivadamam chodi do, tyam sudhi ke te loko te divasa jo'i le, jenum vacana temane apavamam ave che
Te ja akasomam pujya che ane dharatimam pana bandagine layaka te ja che ane te khuba hikamatavalo ane sampurna jnanavalo che
ane te khuba ja barakatavalo che, jeni pase akaso ane dharati ane temani vacceni dareka vastunum samrajya che ane kayamatanum jnana pana te ja jane che ane teni ja tarapha tame sau pacha pharaso
jemane a loko allaha sivaya pokare che, te'o bhalamana karavano adhikara nathi dharavata, (bhalamana karavano adhikara teno che) je satya vatane mane ane temane jnana pana hoya
jo tame te lokone pucho ke temanum sarjana kone karyum, to ni:Sanka te loko javaba apase ke"allaha", pachi a loko kyam ja'i rahya che
ane temana (payagambaranum) evum kahevum che ke he mara palanahara! Kharekhara a te loko che, je'o imana nathi lavata
basa! Tame temanathi modhum pheravi lo ane salama kahi do, te loko najikamam ja jani lese
ha-mim
soganda che a spasta (rite varnana kari denari) kitabana
ni:Sanka ame a kitabane barakatavali ratamam avatarita kari, ni:Sanka ame saceta karanara che
a ja ratamam dareka thosa karyano nirnaya karavamam ave che
amara adesa pachi, ame ja payagambara banavine mokali'e chi'e
tamara palanaharani krpathi, te ja sambhalavavalo, janavavalo che
je akaso ane dharatino palanahara che ane je kami temani vacce che, jo tame yakina karata hoya
tena sivaya ko'i pujya nathi, te ja jivita kare che ane mrtyu ape che, te ja tamaro ane tamara purvajono palanahara che
parantu te sankamam padine mojamaja kare
tame te divasani raha ju'o. Jyare akasa khullo dhumado lavase
je lokone gheravamam la'i lese, a sakhata prakopa hase
Kahese ke, he amara palanahara! A aphata amari samethi hathavi de ame imana lavi'e chi'e
temana mate sikhamana kyam che, spasta rite janavi denara payagambaro temani pase avi gaya
to pana te'o'e temanathi modhum pheravi lidhum ane kahi didhum ke sikhavadelo, pagala che
ame prakopane saheja dura kari da'isum to, tame pharivara potani te ja sthitimam avi jaso
je divase ame sakhata pakada karisum, kharekhara ame badalo levavala che
